right.text: YOU ALWAYS TAKE THE WRONG FUCKING SIDES IN ARGUMENTS

left.text: if you're not really fat then why are you so angry? why did it offend you, what's your problem
YOUR LOGIC IS FUCKED! YOUR JUDGMENT IS FUCKED!

right.text: i think he's lapsing into a big fat diabetic seizure. he's not going to remember any of this in ten minutes, don't worry about it
